location: Guishan Road, Wanhua District, near Longshan Temple MRT and Ximen MRT
notes: Large 3BR/2BA unit (46 ping) on 7F with elevator access - excellent for family with stroller. Pet-friendly and cooking allowed with natural gas. Very convenient location near multiple MRT stations. Cannot assess modernity or baby safety features (balcony railings, sharp corners) without photos; condition unclear from description alone.
